price: "Lalle, Nĩ Ni ne Allah. Bãbu abin bautawa fãce Ni. Sai ka bauta Mini, kuma ka tsayar da salla dõmin tuna Ni."
arabic: إِنَّنِيٓ أَنَا ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّآ أَنَا۠ فَٱعۡبُدۡنِي وَأَقِمِ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ لِذِكۡرِيٓ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: innanī anā al-lahu lā ilāha illā anā fa-uʿ'bud'nī wa-aqimi al-ṣalata lidhik'rī
